title: Straight Talk On Sales, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO5
description: Good sales skills aren't just for sales people.  They are essential for success in life.  In this episode, Andy delivers straightforward advice on success in sales, from starting with a good product to keeping the main thing front and center:  helping people.
content:encoded: Good sales skills aren't just for sales people.  They are essential for success in life.  In this episode, Andy delivers straightforward advice on success in sales, from starting with a good product to keeping the main thing front and center:  helping people.
